about_the_game:
“A way to say “Thank You” to every player of Phil Alone - Gabriel Dias”

INSTALLATION:

After installed, the DLC will be downloaded in your local folder.
Check the game library, right click "Phil Alone", click "Properties" and find the "Local Files".
It's in the file "English Version".

ABOUT:

This booklet is about the game development and it’s something more to those that enjoyed the game, it has a lot of details of the development since the beginning of the production on Ludum Dare up until after 30 days on Steam. It is an A5 sized ebook (a PDF file) with over 20 pages, and in this art book you will find:

- Explanations of decisions made in the production period.
- Changes that were made thanks to player feedback.
- Explanations on how crowdfunding issues worked.
- Experience of 30 days after the release on Steam.
- Detailed information about the characters.
- New arts.

WARNING:
